snippet: Deng Hong, the founder of Jiuzhai Paradise, one of China’s biggest hotels, is a well-connected billionaire now under investigation by the Communist Party’s anti-corruption commission.
abstract: Jiuzhaigou Journal; Deng Hong, billionaire founder of Jiuzhai Paradise, one of China's largest hotels, has come under investigation by Communist Party's anti-corruption commission; hotel, located near nature reserve in Tibetan area of western China, was built with help of strong and potentially corrupt political connections.

byline.contributor: Mia Li and Ye Fanfei contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Deng Hong, the founder of Jiuzhai Paradise, one of China’s biggest hotels, is a well-connected billionaire now under investigation by the Communist Party’s anti-corruption commission.

headline.main: Fog-Wreathed Paradise, Built by a Billionaire Under a Cloud
headline.print_headline: Fog-Wreathed Paradise, Built by a Billionaire Under a Cloud
